title: The mad scientist of music
description: Mark Applebaum writes music that breaks the rules in fantastic ways, composing a concerto for a florist and crafting a musical instrument from junk and found objects. This quirky talk might just inspire you to shake up the "rules" of your own creative work.
author: Mark Applebaum
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, art, composing, music, creativity, live music, entertainment
